song_name: Don't Let It Bring You Down
metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Don't Let It Bring You Down has complexity on par with the typical song, having near-average scores in Chord Complexity, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody and below-average scores in Melodic Complexity and Chord-Melody Tension.
key_conclusion: Don't Let It Bring You Down has sections analyzed in the following keys: D Dorian,  and D Minor.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
